title: Reading Champions
summary: An intensive literacy program for elementary students who need extra support to reach grade-level reading proficiency.
description:
Reading Champions provides targeted support for children ages 7-10 who are reading below grade level. Through one-on-one tutoring and small group sessions, we help students overcome reading challenges and build confidence.

Our evidence-based curriculum focuses on phonics, fluency, vocabulary, and comprehension. Each child receives a personalized learning plan based on their specific needs and learning style. We use engaging, culturally relevant books and interactive technology to make learning exciting.

The program includes regular progress assessments, parent communication, and coordination with school teachers to ensure consistent support. Students who complete the program typically gain 1.5 years of reading ability in just 6 months!
